baseRule.text: 若復苾芻尼經宿與欲者。波逸底迦。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 125

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，與人受具足戒已，經宿方往比丘僧中與受具足戒者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 139

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼異宿與弟子受具足戒。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 119

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。宿作乞屬和上尼羯磨。畜為眾者。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 127

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。一眾清淨停宿受具足波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 107
